code: import axios from'axios';import*as Config from'./../constants/Config';import{trackPromise}from'react-promise-tracker';var axiosIntance=axios.create({});export default function callApi(endpoint){var method=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'GET';var body=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;var ax=axiosIntance({method:method,url:"/cxf/v1/".concat(endpoint),data:body});return trackPromise(ax);};
